summary: Provides a context manager that temporarily redirects the process’s standard output and error streams, records everything written to them, optionally re‑emits the captured data on exit, and makes the recorded text available through attributes for later inspection.
business_intent: Enables test code and other utilities to capture, examine, and optionally replay console output without polluting the global streams, facilitating assertions on printed messages and clean isolation of I/O side‑effects.
